text:
Because I have a lot of fun people often don’t know when I am being sincere.

I say this with all my heart

Governor Andrew Cuomo murdered old people in nursing homes by forcing nursing homes to accept coronavirus+ patients. 

CNN helped him.

Cuomo Brothers are murderous Nazis.
